attributes.action: Ban plastic shopping bags. Offer paper, cotton or hessian bags as alternatives
attributes.additional_details:
Despite extending the 5p charge on single-use plastic bags, major retailers in England still sold 2.1 billion in the last financial year.
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-42652937.
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/carrier-bag-charge-summary-of-data-in-england/single-use-plastic-carrier-bags-charge-data-in-england-for-2016-to-2017
attributes.background:
It was reported that despite introducing the 5p charge, major shops in England still sold 2.1 billion single-use plastic bags in the last financial year.

I propose to introduce a ban on all plastic bags. Retailers should offer either; paper bags or cotton bags (made from recycled materials).
